document.full_text: adam smith, a government witness, testified that he developed a relationship with an intersil executive and passed the information to raj rajaratnam, the head of the galleon group.
document.title: ex-galleon worker tells of gathering tips on intersil
lines_and_colors: adam smith, a government witness, testified that he developed a relationship with an intersil executive and passed the information to raj rajaratnam, the head of the galleon group.
